name: Exports Registry Key To a File
description: Detects the export of the target Registry key to a file.
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ee][Dd][Ii][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \/[Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee]\ .*/)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:(/.*[Hh][Kk][Ll][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Hh][Kk][Ee][Yy]_[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]_[Mm][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ii][Nn][Ee].*/)) AND (process.command_line:(/.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Aa][Mm]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]/)))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\regedit.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \/E\ * OR *\ \-E\ *)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:(*hklm* OR *hkey_local_machine*)) AND (process.command_line:(*\\system OR *\\sam OR *\\security)))))`
